item.title: Linear regression of time series
item.description: This post is under construction, with missing graphs and unbaked LaTax math. Time series regression The following text covers mostly in-sample deconstruction of temporally sensitive effects that can be applied to other problems, including forecasting. We denote a time series context with some additional subscripts: $$y_t = \alpha + \sum_{i=1}^m \beta_i x_{i,t} + \epsilon_t$$ The properties of variables that constitute $x$ determine what kind of time series regression we perform.
